snippet.title: Hamster Ball (PSN) Trailer
snippet.description: In Hamsterball, players take control of a hamster-in-a-ball as they run the most frenzied race of their lives! The clock is ticking and EVERYTHING is out to stop them  with crazy obstacles around every turn, unexpected twists and dramatic drops, each level will immerse and challenge players in new and inventive ways! Gamers can race solo, play split-screen against a friend, or battle up to six buddies in Sumo Mode to determine whose hamster is King of the Hill. With over 50 levels and three different game modes, Hamsterball is sure to provide hours of non-stop, critter-racing action.
